jobs.title: Furniture construction
jobs.description: We need a carpenter to construct furniture for a newly furnished house. Full details shall be provided.

jobs.title: Roof repair
jobs.description: We are looking for a carpenter to help us evaluate and damages done to our roof and give us a cost estimate for the repairs.

jobs.title: Cafe setup
jobs.description: The services of an ICT personnel are needed to setup our cybercafe. This includes networking the computers to a centralized terminal.

jobs.title: Chairs supply
jobs.description: We need 500 plastic chairs supplied to our secretariat. This is URGENT as we need them before independence day.
